title: Good Meat Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Good afternoon, Lanzhu-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Ruby! What is it, all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Umm, do you know what day today is?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>It’s November 29th.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>“11/29” can be spelled out as “ii niku” in Japanese, which means “good meat”. So today is good meat day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Eeeh!? Today is that great of a day!? Why isn’t it a holiday!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ahaha.... we have a lot of days like this in Japan. Anyway, Ruby heard you like meat, Lanzhu-san. So Ruby brought some roast beef Ruby made with Onee-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Roast beef! Lanzhu loves that! But Lanzhu is also really happy that you came here for me, Ruby! Come on, have some too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Then, let’s eat it together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaaah! That’s a great idea! Eating meat with you must be the tastiest thing in the world~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
